title: Season 7 Discussion :)
body: Whoever designed season 7 should be fired, immediately. Thoughts?

replies.body: Loving the plants and the balanced changes to rengar etc (Not) xddddd

Seems to me that you're one of those "typical, whiney b!tches" that can't accept the game is evolving.

Seriously, get the f*ck over it. 

I got over the Quinn changes that came last year even though I think it's utter cr*p, so I can say with full confidence that you can learn to accept the new changes this pre-season.

Then again, that's just my opinion.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Some of the changes have been good, solid changes.  The new jungle tempo is going to be quite interesting, the plants are just ignorable, yes, Rengar seems damned OP and in need of a nerf, but something always ends up stupidly OP in these big shakeups, as long as he (and maybe Khazix) are back down to a regular level of utterly terrifying by next patch, I think it's all good.  Supports have item choice, which is a good thing.

The loss of tank junglers due to the loss of vision, and the power of assassins is a sad trend for the meta, as teamfights are likely to consist of 1-2 seconds of instagibbing each other before all over.  Again, when assassins and some of the more OP penetration (sorry, lethality) items are made a bit less lethal, we should have an interesting season.
